mentions.context: We also consider products targeting data storage and synchronization for personal applications like SpiderOak [11] which are related to PDMS.

In the first part of the tutorial, we review, compare and categorize, academic PDMS proposals [1,2,3,12,17,19,25,32,33,37] and industrial products representative of the current PDMS offer (CozyCloud [39], Inrupt [40], MyDex [41], Digi.me [42], Meeco [43], BitsAbout.Me [44], Perkeep [45], CloudLocker [46], MyCloud [47]).
